text: I think that this would be the only way to add this functionality at this point in time: You can use custom code to send a request to a serverless function that has the crypto package loaded and then have the serverless function return the response. Unfortunately HubSpot doesn't have the vm package preloaded, if they did you could include packages using http, see this stackoverflow post for more information: <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7809397/how-to-require-from-url-in-node-js>
